name: Emoticon Coloring book – color emoticons
description:
The best coloring book app with a big selection of emoticons. Color and have fun with your children. The user-friendly design is perfect for tablet as well. Learn and have fun!
Features:
• Kids can color emoticons with pencils of their choice.
• They can learn how to mix colors and boost their creativity.
• Educational game for kids with endless possibilities.
• You can share images with your friends.
• Kids can use their fingers as crayons to paint emoticons drawings.
You can buy a version without ads
